description: A React functional component named DeviceTable that manages and displays a list of devices, including features such as fetching, sorting, searching, deletion confirmation, and UI states (loading, error, empty).

methods.name: fetchDevices
methods.description: Fetches the list of devices from the API and updates state accordingly.

methods.name: handleDeleteClick
methods.description: Initiates deletion process by setting the device to delete and opening confirmation dialog.

methods.name: handleDeleteConfirm
methods.description: Performs device deletion via API call and updates state and UI upon success or failure.

methods.name: toggleSort
methods.description: Toggles sorting order and key for devices list.
